wiki.summary: "Bad at Love" is a song performed by Halsey. It is the second single of her sophomore studio album, Hopeless Fountain Kingdom, on which it is featured as the tenth track on the standard and as the eleventh track on the deluxe edition. It was released on June 2, 2017 through Astralwerks Records and impacted the pop radio on August 22, 2017. The song peaked at #6 on the Billboard Hot 100 and was certified Gold by RIAA. Read more on Last.fm.
